data.name: Roll On Dice
data.detailed_description:
"Roll On Dice"!




Roll On Dice is a pretty simple puzzle game, where you just have to roll on other dices with a 6 sided dice. But it can become quite tricky if you don’t know well your faces. Indeed, in order to beat a dice, you will need to have your top face superior or equal to the one that you are rolling on, otherwise you will break your own…

  • The game has over 50 puzzle levels to beat with this main rolling mechanic
  • The rhythm is pretty relaxing, take your time to solve each level
  • Enjoy the colorful graphics

data.short_description: Roll On Dice is a puzzle game where you have to roll on other dices! Learn your own dice, to determine if your top face number will be superior or equal to the one that you are rolling on, otherwise you will break your own…

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4710HQ CPU @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 860M (4096 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
